title: 2021 IFSC Paraclimbing World Championships
description:
The 2021 IFSC Paraclimbing World Championships is the 7th edition of its kind. To be held in Moscow, Russia from 15 to 21 September 2021, alongside the 2021 IFSC Climbing World Championships, they will include a total of 19 Lead events for the respective athlete's impairment classification.
Two venues will be used during the championships: the Irina Viner-Usmanova Gymnastics Palace and the Athletics and Football Sport Complex "CSKA".
